cause.description:
Are you sick and tired of T.V commercials showing you photos of sick african children and trying to guilt you into sponsoring a child. Or how about the homeless asking for change with thier "GOD BLEES YOU" sign, all charity cases must come to an end.
1. Homeless people are annoying
2. All charity cases have not souls
cause.name: P.A.C (People Against Charities)
